xboxLiveErrors.2148916227: Your account was banned by Xbox for violating one or more Community Standards for Xbox and is unable to be used.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916229: Your account is currently restricted and your guardian has not given you permission to play online. Login to https://account.microsoft.com/family/ and have your guardian change your permissions.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916233: Your account currently does not have an Xbox profile. Please create one at https://signup.live.com/signup
xboxLiveErrors.2148916234: Your account has not accepted Xbox's Terms of Service. Please login and accept them.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916235: Your account resides in a region that Xbox has not authorized use from. Xbox has blocked your attempt at logging in.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916236: Your account requires proof of age. Please login to https://login.live.com/login.srf and provide proof of age.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916237: Your account has reached its limit for playtime. Your account has been blocked from logging in.
xboxLiveErrors.2148916238: The account date of birth is under 18 years and cannot proceed unless the account is added to a family by an adult.
